allow: Bash(python -c "from src.domain.models import POICandidate; print\(''Import successful''\)")

Bash(python3 -c "
import ast
with open\(''tests/test_poi_selection_llm.py''\) as f:
    code = f.read\(\)
try:
    ast.parse\(code\)
    print\(''✅ Syntax is valid''\)
except SyntaxError as e:
    print\(f''❌ Syntax error: {e}''\)
")

Bash(python3 -c "
import ast
files = [
    ''src/application/poi_selection_llm.py'',
    ''src/application/poi_planner.py'',
    ''src/infrastructure/llm_client.py'',
]
for f in files:
    try:
        with open\(f\) as file:
            ast.parse\(file.read\(\)\)
        print\(f''✅ {f}''\)
    except SyntaxError as e:
        print\(f''❌ {f}: {e}''\)
    except FileNotFoundError:
        print\(f''⚠️ {f}: File not found''\)
")
